sys_script_include.name: deals_companies

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_bb9a640f477f211008c85088c26d43ca
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_976837_warrant_0.deals_companies</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>deals_companies</name><script><![CDATA[var deals_companies = Class.create();
deals_companies.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    deals_list: function() {
        var userid = gs.getUserID();
        // 		gs.addErrorMessage(userid);
        var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        user.addQuery('sys_id', userid);
        user.query();
        dealslist = '';
        while (user.next()) {
            var usercompany = user.company;
            var company = new GlideRecord('core_company');
            company.addQuery('sys_id', usercompany);
            company.query();
            while (company.next()) {
                //                 gs.addInfoMessage(company.name);
                if (company.name != 0) {
                    dealslist += ',' + company.sys_id;
                }
            }
        }
        return 'sys_idIN' + dealslist;
    },


    type: 'deals_companies'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-07 08:49:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>bb9a640f477f211008c85088c26d43ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>deals_companies</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Warranty Claims" source="x_976837_warrant_0">488bf91a4773211008c85088c26d4304</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Warranty Claims">488bf91a4773211008c85088c26d4304</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bb9a640f477f211008c85088c26d43ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-07 08:49:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
